Our Method Collaboration and confidentiality

A preliminary visit together with a brief questionnaire enables a collaboration agreement with a confidentiality clause to be established.

We submit a contractual proposal for proper performance and ask you to sign a mandate for the launching of our mission.

According to the real estate context, either we prepare a file of sale, or in the event of letting, on end-of lease file.

According to the objects contained in the property and after removal of the objects retained by the family, we constitute categories of goods to be estimated by various professional experts.

We write an inventory report for the furniture, the jewellery and the items of value, as well as the other objects.

We prepare goods for sale, donation, recycling or throwing out.

We monitor their proper performance in total transparency with the dealers.

We don’t buy any goods: We act as independent advisers.

If you need more info about our services
